channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Identity hunting with an enhanced IdentityInfo table
item.description:
Advanced hunting with an enhanced IdentityInfo table Back in June 2023, we announced the enhanced IdentityInfo table in Microsoft 365 advanced hunting for Microsoft Defender for Identity customers. Today, we are expanding the availability of this table for all Microsoft defender for Cloud apps customers as part of our journey to enable this experience for all Microsoft 365 Defender customers.
What do I get? With this new table, security analysts have much broader experience with identity-based hunting, allowing them to query more attributes from all detected providers, such as Entra ID assi...
